mapper.insert: insert into pins (pins.member_id, prompt, img_path, width, height, seed, negative_prompt) values (#{memberId}, #{prompt}, #{imagePath}, #{width}, #{height}, #{seed}, #{negativePrompt})
mapper.select: SELECT pins.pin_id, member.nickname, pins.img_path, pins.prompt, pins.negative_prompt, pins.width, pins.height, pins.seed FROM pins INNER JOIN member ON pins.member_id = member.member_id ORDER BY pins.pin_id DESC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT pins.pin_id, member.nickname, pins.img_path, pins.prompt, pins.negative_prompt, pins.width, pins.height, pins.seed FROM pins INNER JOIN member ON pins.member_id = member.member_id WHERE pins.prompt LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY pins.pin_id DESC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET #{offset}
select count(*) from pins where prompt LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
